text: The Hammond Calumet Buccaneers were a professional team of basketball that competed in the National Basketball League for only the 1948–49 season. They were based in Hammond, Indiana, and played in the Hammond Civic Center for home games. The team ranked third in the Eastern Division, and was eliminated in the first round of the playoffs by the Syracuse Nationals. ==References== Category:Basketball teams in Indiana Category:National Basketball League (United States) teams Category:Basketball teams established in 1948 Category:Sports clubs disestablished in 1949 Category:Hammond, Indiana Category:1948 establishments in Indiana Category:1949 disestablishments in Indiana
title: Hammond Calumet Buccaneers
